definition: The episode quoted asset node keeps track of the evolution of variables and metrics denominated in the quoted asset, throughout the episode.

paragraphs.text: How the Episode Quoted Asset node works
Learn more about how accounts for the base asset and the quoted asset are kept in the base asset and quoted asset page on the trading engine section of the documentation.
Adding a Episode Quoted Asset node
To add the episode quoted asset node, select Add Missing Items on the parent node menu.
